abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos linebacker Shane Ray, who injured his right knee in overtime win over Cleveland Browns, is preparing with team for upcoming game against Kansas City Chiefs; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Outside linebacker Shane Ray practiced for the first time since injuring his right knee on Oct. 18.

headline.main: With Two Stars Out, Broncos’ Defense Looks to Return of Shane Ray
headline.print_headline: Top Pick Practices, Giving a Lift to Short-Handed Denver

snippet: Outside linebacker Shane Ray practiced for the first time since injuring his right knee on Oct. 18.
